name: Custom Welcome Messages
author: Josh Lobe

sections.description:
This plugin will allow you to add a custom welcome message to your login/register screens. It will also allow you to add a separate custom message for your logout screen. The admin page allows you to add HTML code into the message boxes, so you can include images, links, videos, or any other HTML code. The options are only limited by your imagination. Check out the screenshots for an example.

Features:

  • Add a custom welcome message to all users who visit your login/register page.
  • Add a separate custom message to your logout page.
  • Change the default wordpress logo to your own custom image.
  • Change the default hover text from “Powered by WordPress” to your own custom message.
  • Change the default logo link from “www.wordpress.org” to your own custom link.
  • Manipulate the CSS for the message boxes to make beautiful effects and custom styles.
  • Add links, images, videos, embeds, iframes, or any other HTML compliant tags.

Support:
Visit my support forum.
Visit my personal blog page for this plugin.

Other Plugins by Me:
Ultimate TinyMCE – Finally unlock the true power of your visual editor.

  • Add a custom welcome message to all users who visit your login/register page.
  • Add a separate custom message to your logout page.
  • Change the default wordpress logo to your own custom image.
  • Change the default hover text from “Powered by WordPress” to your own custom message.
  • Change the default logo link from “www.wordpress.org” to your own custom link.
  • Manipulate the CSS for the message boxes to make beautiful effects and custom styles.
  • Add links, images, videos, embeds, iframes, or any other HTML compliant tags.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to your ‘wp-content/plugins’ directory, or download and install automatically through your admin panel.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Visit the plugin admin page via Settings -> Custom Welcome Messages

  4. You must manually enable each option you wish to use.
